note:
The love for numbers and computer science grab my attention to blockchain.
Having spent 8+ years working with tech companies like Accenture.com, Aave.com and many others, I realise that blockchain technology has to be the ”engine” that will drive the roles, responsibilities, and accountabilities for businesses in the future.

Providing architectural designs, consulting, and implementing solutions to leverage blockchain technology is what I am committed to doing going forward.
